price: 43. Maryameey! Adeec Rabbigaa una sujuud, lana rukuuc kuwa (Alle) u rakuuca.
arabic: يَٰمَرۡيَمُ ٱقۡنُتِي لِرَبِّكِ وَٱسۡجُدِي وَٱرۡكَعِي مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāmaryamu uq'nutī lirabbiki wa-us'judī wa-ir'kaʿī maʿa al-rākiʿīna
